definitions: 寄せ[よせ] (n-suf) last moves (in go, shogi, or chess), endgame,gathering, collecting, coming together
寄席[よせ] (n) entertainment hall (for rakugo, manzai, magic, music, etc.), vaudeville theater (theatre), music hall
english: Received "Chocobo Lure" Materia!
japanese: 『チョコボよせ』のマテリアを手にいれた！

definitions: 湿地[しっち] (n) damp ground, wetland, bog, marsh
占地[しめじ] (n) Lyophyllum shimeji (species of edible mushroom),euagaric fungus (in grocery stores, usu. refers to cultivated field mushrooms, etc.)
english: Thinking of crossing the marshes?
japanese: お客さんたち、この先の湿地帯をこえるつもりですか？

definitions: 竹[たけ] (n) bamboo (any grass of subfamily Bambusoideae),middle (of a three-tier ranking system)
茸[きのこ] (n) mushroom
岳[たけ] (n, suf) peak,mountain
丈[たけ] (n) height, stature,length (esp. of clothing),all (one has), everything,magnificence (of a waka poem, etc.)
他家[たけ] (n) another family, another house
english: It's a serpent-like creature over 30 feet tall!!
japanese: 身のたけ１０メートルにならんとするヘビのバケモノ！！

definitions: 蛇[へび] (n) snake,serpent, large snake
english: It's a serpent-like creature over 30 feet tall!!
japanese: 身のたけ１０メートルにならんとするヘビのバケモノ！！

definitions: 聞きつける[ききつける] (v1, vt) to hear, to catch (the sound of something),to hear about (rumour, etc.), to overhear, to learn of (something),to get used to hearing
english: It detects the footsteps of anyone in the marshes.
japanese: 湿地帯を進むズボズボ音を聞きつけ…

definitions: 襲いかかる[おそいかかる] (v5r, vi) to rush on, to attack, to swoop down on
english: And then, BAM!! It attacks!!!
japanese: ウギャーッとおそいかかる！！！

definitions: 牧場[ぼくじょう] (n) farm (livestock), ranch (US), station (Aus, NZ),pasture land, meadow, grazing land
english: To avoid that, buy a Chocobo at me and Choco Billy's Chocobo Farm.
japanese: そうならないためにも！グリン＆グリングリン牧場のチョコボをお買い上げください

definitions: 買い上げる[かいあげる] (v1, vt) to buy (of a government, public agency, etc. from a private citizen), to purchase,to buy up (all of something)

definitions: 買い上げ[かいあげ] (n) buying, purchasing, procurement

definitions: 真っ黒[まっくろ] (adj-na, n) pitch black

definitions: 安い[やすい] (adj-i) cheap, inexpensive,calm, peaceful, quiet
易い[やすい] (aux-adj, adj-i) easy,likely to ..., have a tendency to ...,easy to ...
english: Each level it increases, makes it easier for you to find a Chocobo.
japanese: あの、マテリアはレベルがあがるほどチョコボに会いやすくなるんですよ

definitions: 足る[たる] (v5r, vi) to be sufficient, to be enough,to be worth doing, to be worthy of, to deserve,to do (the job), to serve, to answer
english: … Ummm, you don't have enough…
japanese: …………あの～、お金が足りませんが…

definitions: 商[しょう] (n, n-suf) quotient,dealing, dealer, store,second degree (of the Japanese amp Chinese pentatonic scale),Shang (dynasty of China)

japanese: いえいえ、商売っ気をだしているんではなくてですな。こういう時だからこそ！

definitions: 育成[いくせい] (n, vs) rearing, training, nurture, cultivation, promotion

definitions: 育て[そだて] (n) bringing up, raising

japanese: チョコボをお育てになるには『チョコぼう』と呼ばれる部屋みたいなものが必要となりまして

definitions: 其方[そちら] (pn) that way (direction distant from the speaker, close to the listener),there (place distant from the speaker, close to the listener),that one (something close to the listener),you, your family, your company,that person (someone close to the listener)

japanese: パパとママが死んでからずっとそうなの……

japanese: ただし『チョコボよせ』が無いとチョコボが現れないんだよ。もともと用心深い生き物だしね

definitions: 生き物[いきもの] (n) living thing, animal
english: But, if you don't have 'Chocobo Lure' they won't come out. They're very cautious by nature.
japanese: ただし『チョコボよせ』が無いとチョコボが現れないんだよ。もともと用心深い生き物だしね

definitions: 出し[だし] (n) dashi (Japanese soup stock made from fish and kelp),pretext, excuse, pretense (pretence), dupe, front man
山車[だし] (n) parade float, festival float
english: But, if you don't have 'Chocobo Lure' they won't come out. They're very cautious by nature.
japanese: ただし『チョコボよせ』が無いとチョコボが現れないんだよ。もともと用心深い生き物だしね

definitions: おびき出す[おびきだす] (v5s, vt) to lure out of, to decoy out of,to drive to (tears, sleep, etc.), to evoke (sympathy, etc.),to abduct, to entice out of
english: 'Chocobo Lure' is a type of Materia which attracts Chocobos.
japanese: 『チョコボよせ』はチョコボをおびきだすマテリアさ

definitions: 周り[まわり] (n) circumference, girth,surroundings, neighbourhood, neighborhood, vicinity
回り[まわり] (suf, ctr) rotation,making the rounds,spreading,effect, efficacy,by way of, via,round, turn,size,12-year period, 12-year age difference
english: That is why you must defeat the monsters first before you catch the Chocobo.
japanese: だから、まずチョコボのまわりにいるモンスターを倒す必要があるんだ

definitions: 野菜[やさい] (n, adj-no) vegetable
english: But, if you use 'Greens' they'll focus on them and won't run away.
japanese: けど、『野菜』を使うと食べるのに夢中になって逃げにくくなるのさ

definitions: 夢中[むちゅう] (n) absorbed in, immersed in, crazy about, obsessed with, devoted to,forgetting oneself, daze, trance, ecstasy, delirium,within a dream, while dreaming
english: But, if you use 'Greens' they'll focus on them and won't run away.
japanese: けど、『野菜』を使うと食べるのに夢中になって逃げにくくなるのさ

definitions: 一目散[いちもくさん] (n) running at full speed, going as fast as one can go
english: Oh, and remember, once you get off a Chocobo, it'll escape.
japanese: あっ、それと捕まえたチョコボは一度チョコボからおりたら一目散に逃げてしまうよ

definitions: 商談[しょうだん] (n, vs) business discussion, negotiation
english: Well then, shall we get down to business?
japanese: じゃあ、そろそろ商談に入ろうかな

definitions: 蟻[あり] (n) ant
在り[あり] (vr, vi) existing (at the present moment),alright, acceptable, passable,to be (usu. of inanimate objects), to have
english: Thanks!
japanese: まいどあり！

definitions: 一寸[ちょっと] (int) a little, a bit, slightly,just a minute, for a moment, briefly,somewhat, rather, fairly, pretty, quite,(not) easily, (not) readily,hey!, excuse me
english: Get some information
japanese: チョット話を聞く

definitions: カップリング (n) coupling,shipping, [object Object]
english: Mating Chocobos
japanese: チョコボをカップリングする

definitions: 逃がす[にがす] (v5s, vt) to set free, to let go, to release,to miss (e.g. a chance), to lose, to let get away, to fail to catch
english: Releasing Chocobos
japanese: チョコボを逃がす

definitions: 戻す[もどす] (v5s, vt) to put back, to return, to give back, to restore (to a previous state, e.g. defrosting, reconstituting, reconciling), to turn back (e.g. clock hand),to vomit, to throw up,to recover (of a market price)
english: You must return the Chocobo that's out, if you want to take out a different one.
japanese: 他のチョコボで外に出たいなら今、外に出してるチョコボを戻してからにしてよ

definitions: お祖父さん[おじいさん] (n) grandfather,male senior-citizen
english: If you want to raise Chocobos, go talk to Grandpa.
japanese: チョコボを育てたいならおじいさんに会ってきてよ

definitions: 持ち出す[もちだす] (v5s, vt) to take out, to carry out, to bring out from where it belongs,to mention something, to broach a topic, to bring up (a subject), to raise (an issue), to mention
english: And even if you take it outside, this Chocobo won't run away when you get off of it.
japanese: それに、ここから外にもちだした、チョコボはおりても逃げださなくなるよ

definitions: 為せる[させる] (v1, vt) to make (someone) do,to allow (someone) to
然せる[させる] (adj-pn) worth special consideration
せる (aux-v, v1) [object Object],[object Object],[object Object]
english: Chocobos will mature differently depending on which 'Greens' they eat. Certain 'Greens' will boost their stamina.
japanese: それとね、チョコボは食べる『野菜』によって、育ち方が違ったりするんだよ。ある『野菜』を食べさせてるとスタミナモリモリになったりとかね

definitions: 其処ら[そこら] (n) everywhere, somewhere, approximately, that area, around there
english: You'll have to figure out which kinds have what effects for yourselves.
japanese: そこらへんの、効果は自分で覚えていくのがいいね

definitions: 以て[もって] (exp, conj) with, by, by means of,because of, on account of, for, due to,on (a day, date), at (a time), as of (e.g. today),adds emphasis to preceding word,in addition (to being), moreover, as well as, and,therefore, and so, hence
english: Oh, and Chocobos are born with certain natural abilities. So, no matter how much they mature, they can't get more abilities than what they're born with.
japanese: それと、チョコボにはもって生まれた能力があってね自分の持っている能力以上は育たないんだ

definitions: 限界[げんかい] (n, adj-no) limit, bound
english: If a Chocobo's abilities don't increase even when you feed it, that means it's reached its limit.
japanese: エサをあげても、能力が上がらなくなったらそのチョコボの限界がきてると思っていいよ

definitions: ストック (n) stock,ski pole
english: The Chocobo out there is part of the stock that you caught.
japanese: 外のチョコボは、お客さんが捕まえたチョコボのストックさ

definitions: 余地[よち] (n) place, room, margin, scope
english: There's still lots of room to grow.
japanese: まだまだ成長の余地はありそうだね

definitions: タンタル (n, adj-no) tantalum (Ta)
english: Tantal Greens =
japanese: タンタルの野菜

definitions: 言[げん] (n) word, remark, statement
現[げん] (pref) present (e.g. government, administration), current, existing
厳[げん] (adj-t, adv-to) strict, stern
ゲン (n) gene
源[げん] (suf) source, origin
絃[げん] (n) string (of a shamisen, etc.),stringed instrument
原[げん] (pref) original, primitive, primary, fundamental, raw
減[げん] (suf) reduction
元[げん] (n) unknown (e.g. in an equation),element (of a set),yuan (monetary unit of China),Yuan dynasty (China)
弦[げん] (n) bowstring,string (of a shamisen, etc.), stringed instrument,chord,hypotenuse
監[げん] (n) special Nara-period administrative division for areas containing a detached palace (Yoshino and Izumi),secretary, [object Object]
験[げん] (n) effect, efficacy,omen
舷[げん] (n) side of a boat, gunwale
english: Reagan Greens =
japanese: レイゲンの野菜

definitions: 汁[しる] (n) juice, sap,soup, broth,(dipping) sauce

知る[しる] (v5r, vt) to be aware of, to know, to be conscious of, to cognize, to cognise,to notice, to feel,to understand, to comprehend, to grasp,to remember, to be acquainted with (a procedure),to experience, to go through, to learn,to be acquainted with (a person), to get to know,to concern
english: Sylkis Greens =
japanese: シルキスの野菜

definitions: 記す[しるす] (v5s) to write down, to note, to jot down,to remember
キス (n, vs) kiss
鱚[きす] (n) sillago (any fish of genus Sillago, esp. the Japanese whiting, Sillago japonica)

期す[きす] (v5s, vs-c, vi) to fix (a time, date, etc.), to set,to expect, to hope for, to look forward to, to foresee, to anticipate,to resolve (to do), to decide upon, to prepare for, to promise, to pledge
帰す[きす] (v5s, vs-c) to come to (in the end), to end in,to attribute, to blame
english: Sylkis Greens =
japanese: シルキスの野菜

definitions: 羽[わ] (ctr) counter for birds and rabbits
把[わ] (ctr) counter for bundles
パ (n) pas (dancing step),Pakistan,Pacific League (Japanese baseball league)
ぱ (suf) apiece, each
english: Param Nut =
japanese: パラムの実

definitions: ラム (n) lamb (meat),rum,ram,rump
ＲＡＭ[ラム] (n) random-access memory, RAM
english: Param Nut =
japanese: パラムの実

definitions: 賢い[かしこい] (adj-i) wise, clever, smart
english: Intelligence Plus!
japanese: かしこさアップ！

definitions: 性格[せいかく] (n) character, personality, disposition, nature
english: Their personalities improved!
japanese: 性格がよくなった！

definitions: メモ (n, vs) memo, note, memorandum
english: Wow, that's amazing! …Let me take some notes.
japanese: へぇ、おもしろ～いメモっとこ

definitions: 面白い[おもしろい] (adj-i) interesting, fascinating, intriguing, enthralling,amusing, funny, comical,pleasant, enjoyable, agreeable, fun
english: For telling me that story, I'll tell you about each Chocobo's abilities.
japanese: 面白い話聞かせてくれたお礼にクリンがチョコボの能力を見抜いてあげる

definitions: 栗[くり] (n) Japanese chestnut (Castanea crenata)
庫裏[くり] (n) temple kitchen, monastery kitchen,quarters of a head priest (and his family)
刳り[くり] (n) hollow, scoop
クリ (n) clitoris
english: For telling me that story, I'll tell you about each Chocobo's abilities.
japanese: 面白い話聞かせてくれたお礼にクリンがチョコボの能力を見抜いてあげる

definitions: 見抜く[みぬく] (v5k, vt) to see through, to see into (someone's heart, mind, etc.), to perceive, to find out, to detect
english: For telling me that story, I'll tell you about each Chocobo's abilities.
japanese: 面白い話聞かせてくれたお礼にクリンがチョコボの能力を見抜いてあげる

definitions: 速[そく] (suf, ctr) gear, speed (e.g. 4-speed transmission)
english: From what I see, the fastest sprinter is…
japanese: クリンが見たところダッシュが１番速そうなのは…

definitions: 彼処[あそこ] (n) there (place physically distant from both speaker and listener), over there, that place, yonder, you-know-where,genitals, private parts, nether regions,that far (something psychologically distant from both speaker and listener), that much, that point
樫粉[かしご] (n) oak flour (esp. as animal food), acorn flour
畏[かしこ] (exp) yours sincerely (used to sign off on letters), respectfully yours
english: Finally, the most intelligent one is…
japanese: 最後に、クリンが見たところ１番かしこそうなのは…

definitions: 川[かわ] (suf) river, stream,River, the ... river
english: Other than regular Chocobo, there are Mountain Chocobo' and 'River-Chocobo'.
japanese: チョコボには普通のチョコボ以外に『山チョコボ』と『川チョコボ』がいるんだって。

definitions: 南東[なんとう] (n, adj-no) southeast
english: A 'Great Chocobo' and a 'Good Chocobo' are found… on an island southeast of the Chocobo Sage's dwelling at Corel and in the area west of Corel. The 'Carob Nut' can be found south of the Chocobo Sage's dwelling. Monsters carry them. Let's see, is Bone Village just south of there?
japanese: 『すごくいいチョコボ』と『いい感じのチョコボ』はチョコボせんにんがいる所から南東の島とコレル。それとコレルの西の方でとれるんだって。それから『カラブの実』はチョコボせんにんのいる所から南にいるモンスターがよく持ってるんだってさ。あそこから南って言うとボーンビレッジあたりかしら？

definitions: 取れる[とれる] (v1, vi, vt) to come off, to be removed,(of pain, a fever, etc.) to disappear,to be caught, to be harvested,to be interpreted (as), to be taken as,(of balance, etc.) to be attained,to be obtainable
撮れる[とれる] (v1) to be photographed,to be able to photograph
録れる[とれる] (v1) to be recorded (sound, etc.),to be able to record
採れる[とれる] (v1) to be collected, to be gathered (e.g. mushrooms, etc.), to be harvested, to be mined,to be able to collect, to be able to mine
捕れる[とれる] (v1) to be caught, to be captured,to be able to catch, to be able to capture
獲れる[とれる] (v1) to be harvested, to be reaped, to be yielded,to be able to harvest, to be able to reap, to be able to yield
english: A 'Great Chocobo' and a 'Good Chocobo' are found… on an island southeast of the Chocobo Sage's dwelling at Corel and in the area west of Corel. The 'Carob Nut' can be found south of the Chocobo Sage's dwelling. Monsters carry them. Let's see, is Bone Village just south of there?
japanese: 『すごくいいチョコボ』と『いい感じのチョコボ』はチョコボせんにんがいる所から南東の島とコレル。それとコレルの西の方でとれるんだって。それから『カラブの実』はチョコボせんにんのいる所から南にいるモンスターがよく持ってるんだってさ。あそこから南って言うとボーンビレッジあたりかしら？

definitions: 吃驚[びっくり] (adj-f) to be surprised, to be amazed, to be frightened, to be astonished, to get startled, to jump,surprise (e.g. surprise party)
english: One surprise: If you get the "Mountain Chocobo" and the "River Chocobo" to produce an egg, You'll get a Chocobo that can cross mountains and rivers. I bet that the right nut for that is the "Carob Nut."
japanese: ちょっとビックリ『山チョコボ』と『川チョコボ』にタマゴを生ませると山も川も越えられるチョコボが出来るんだって。きっと、実は『カラブの実』がいいと思うな。

definitions: 越える[こえる] (v1, vt) to cross over, to cross, to pass through, to pass over (out of), to go beyond, to go past,to exceed, to surpass, to be more (than)
english: One surprise: If you get the "Mountain Chocobo" and the "River Chocobo" to produce an egg, You'll get a Chocobo that can cross mountains and rivers. I bet that the right nut for that is the "Carob Nut."
japanese: ちょっとビックリ『山チョコボ』と『川チョコボ』にタマゴを生ませると山も川も越えられるチョコボが出来るんだって。きっと、実は『カラブの実』がいいと思うな。

definitions: 小島[こじま] (n) small island, islet
english: Zeio Nuts are found on a little island east of the Chocobo Sage. Goblins' have them. With this, you can produce an 'Ocean Chocobo'.
japanese: 『ゼイオの実』はチョコボせんにんがいる所から東の小さな小島にいる『ゴブリン』がもってるんだってこれで『海チョコボ』も生ませられるね。

definitions: レース (n) race,lace,lathe
english: According to my research, Mountain, River, and Ocean Chocobos are hard to produce. But, if you take the right care of the Chocobo and increase their Class ranking by winning at the races, it'll increase your chances of getting one.
japanese: クリンの研究によると山、川、海チョコボはメモの条件だけだとチョット、生まれにくいみたい。けど、うまく育ててレースにだしてクラスをあげてやるととっても生まれやすくなるみたいね.

definitions: 迚も[とても] (adv) very, awfully, exceedingly,(not) at all, by no means, simply (cannot)
english: According to my research, Mountain, River, and Ocean Chocobos are hard to produce. But, if you take the right care of the Chocobo and increase their Class ranking by winning at the races, it'll increase your chances of getting one.
japanese: クリンの研究によると山、川、海チョコボはメモの条件だけだとチョット、生まれにくいみたい。けど、うまく育ててレースにだしてクラスをあげてやるととっても生まれやすくなるみたいね.
